data: PED UROL Bladder Augmentation / Mitrofanoof Surgery - Preoperative / Admission
Verify that an 'Admit to' Order has been entered prior to completing the powerplan (NOT required for direct admit patients)
Droplet and Contact, COVID-19, use appropriate eye protection

If oral route of bowel washout is not tolerated, consider NG Tube placement
If oral route of bowel washout is not tolerated
Calculate Pediatric Maintenance Fluids based on 1.5 times Maintenance
PED Peripheral IV and IV Fluids (Module)
Select PEG 3350 17 g powder or  PICO-SALAX EQUIV powder
PEGLYTE EQUIV 280 g/4000 mL oral liq
